io.oddworks.device.handler

Class OddMetricHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.oddworks.device.handler.OddMetricHandler

  • public class OddMetricHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton that handles the HTTP POST calls for OddMetric events. This class must be explicitly enabled, otherwise it will not listen for events posted to the OddBus. Once enabled, any OddMetric object that is picked up on the OddBus will automatically be sent back to Oddworks via the ApiCaller.
    Since:
    v1.0
